typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updatet_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
source(output(
		cur_code as string,
		cur_description as string,
		from_currency_code as string,
		exchange_rate as decimal(12,2),
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd as decimal(12,2),
		last_updatet_by as string,
		top_code as string,
		top_description as string,
		Dim_key as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> dimCurrencyInput
preDimCurrency derive(top_code = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
ConditionalSplit1@newRows keyGenerate(output(Dim_key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> DimKeyIncrement
dimCurrencyInput aggregate(maxKey = max(Dim_key)) ~> MaxDimKey
DimKeyIncrement, MaxDimKey join(!(top_code == '') && maxKey !=0,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinWithMaxDimKey
JoinWithMaxDimKey derive(Dim_key = Dim_key+maxKey) ~> DimKey
RemoveDuplicateColumn split(isMatch(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(existingRows, newRows)
dimCurrencyInput select(mapColumn(
		cur_code,
		Dim_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecBusinessKeyColumn
LookupExisting select(mapColumn(
		Dim_key,
		top_code,
		top_description,
		cur_code = preDimCurrency@cur_code,
		cur_description,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd,
		last_updatet_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicateColumn
DimKey select(mapColumn(
		Dim_key,
		top_code,
		top_description,
		cur_iso_code = cur_code,
		cur_description,
		curr_last_exchange_rate_to_usd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutputColumns
DeriveTopLevel, SelecBusinessKeyColumn lookup(preDimCurrency@cur_code == SelecBusinessKeyColumn@cur_code,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupExisting
SelectOutputColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrencyInsert
ConditionalSplit1@existingRows sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrencyUpdate
